'''Manyoya''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that first appears in the {{Quest|A Saurian Returns to the Nest}}. 

She was a member of the Tlalocan flying squad for many years, but recently retired because her physical condition "fell off from where it used to be."<ref>{{Ref/Quest|A Saurian Returns to the Nest}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* ''{{wt|manyoya|Manyoya}}'' is the plural form of ''{{wt|unyoya}}'' which means "feather" in Swahili.
